Body:
In a recent question seeking to clarify how diphthongs relate to phonemes, another term popped up in the comments, segment.

This made me wonder if "segment" is some kind of synonym for either "phone" or "phoneme", just some way to avoid using those terms, or some other concept all together.

So what is a segment and how do segments relate to phonemes and phones?
Title: Where does the term "segment" fit in in relation to "phone" and "phoneme"?

OwnerUser.AboutMe:
Travelling armchair linguist.

Never studied in an institution but read books and web with probably more breadth than depth.

Always on the road surviving in a strange foreign language, currently Mongolian and Mandarin Chinese.

And I collect dictionaries.
